name: H Girl Kemonomimi
description:
Introduction

H Girl Kemonomimi is a puzzle game. Players only need to swap the tiles to restore the picture. For players without patience, the game supports the cheat mode: one click to auto swap the puzzle. There is no time, score, or ranking limitation in the game. It is only for players' joy.

Features

  • 5 characters, 50 high resolution original images, 200 undress phases (dressed->underwear->nude->????)
  • Kemonomimi
  • Jiggle physics. Choose how hard and how fast as you want
  • Relaxing music
  • Changeable background
  • Undo/Redo swapping
  • Auto swap
  • Zoom In/Out
  • Historical gallery
  • 50 achievements

Jiggle Physics
